# Plotting

I'm just going to plot something here:


```{r, echo = TRUE}
data(iris)
names(iris)
plot(Sepal.Length ~ Sepal.Width, data = iris, type = "p")
abline(lm(Sepal.Length ~ Sepal.Width, data = iris), lwd = 1.5, col = "red")
```
